Name: Blade of Darkness
About the game: game introduction 'Blade of Darkness' is an abyss-themed 2.5D barrage shooting Rogue Like game. Game Features 1. The location where you enter the portal is random. 2. The abyss species encountered are rich and diverse. 3. We can enrich our abilities in the abyss. Use W-A-S-D to control the main character's movements Shoot with the left mouse button A portal from the abyss appeared in the town. In order to protect the town, the protagonist of the warrior decided to enter the portal to prevent the invasion of the abyss. Come on, warrior.
